body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.7 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Improved device management for DOS drives.
Many Richedit fixes.
Various installer fixes, particularly for IE 7.
First steps of Direct3D 10 implementation.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
